definitions.definition: A mindset ; a way of thinking ; a set of beliefs.
examples: Before he can succeed, he will have to shed the mentality that he can get by without hard work.

definitions.definition: The characteristics of a mind described as a system of distinctive structures and processes based in biology, language, or culture, etc.; a mental system.

main_definition: A mindset ; a way of thinking ; a set of beliefs.
secondary_definitions: The characteristics of a mind described as a system of distinctive structures and processes based in biology, language, or culture, etc.; a mental system.
